APN - CSOTC Infrastructure, Garrison Petawawa, Ontario #
======================================================================

### Information

*   **Reference Number:** MX-43056409158

*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-16T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2024-04-16
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-08-07
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-08-07

### Project Details

*   This project involves the development and construction of the Canadian Special Operations Training Centre (CSOTC) at Garrison Petawawa, Ontario.
*   The project will consist of renovations to an existing building (4,709 sq m) and the construction of 24,863 sq m of new built space over several facilities.
*   The new space will include a combined cooling, heating, and power plant, training facilities, warehousing, vehicle storage, maintenance workshops, kitchens, and accommodations.

### Security Requirements

*   Due to the sensitive nature of the project, the design and construction firm(s) must hold all required security clearance(s) at the time of closing.
*   The required security clearance(s) include a valid and active Facility Security Clearance (FSC) at the level of SECRET with approved Document Safeguarding at the level of SECRET.
*   Defence Construction Canada (DCC) will provide consultants or contractors with early access to the security clearance application process through sponsorship under its Industrial Security Program (ISP).

### Tender Requirements

*   Interested contractors must begin the security clearance application process by submitting a sponsorship request application to DCC.
*   Once the sponsorship request application is submitted, DCC will review and complete the sponsorship request package.
*   The package will then be forwarded to the CSP, PWGSC for processing.
*   Contractors must cooperate with the CSP, PWGSC in a timely fashion to further the process.

### Contact Information

*   For any questions or concerns, please contact Cameron King, Regional Service Line Leader, Contract Services, Defence Construction Canada at 613-483-9587 or Cameron.King@dcc-cdc.gc.ca

### Disclaimer

*   Defence Construction Canada does not provide any assurances or guarantees that a sponsorship request package or a security clearance application will be successful or result in the granting of the required security
